name: Climbing cubes
description:
A short side-on puzzlescript game about making blocks to move a cube up towards a target.

Mobile friendly version: https://www.puzzlescript.net/play.html?p=c2f6068b3465f0cc03c13ac563000f0e

Source code: https://www.puzzlescript.net/editor.html?hack=c2f6068b3465f0cc03c13ac563000f0e

(Part of my daily puzzlescript creations. Visit my page for more or go here: https://itch.io/c/337780/my-puzzlescript-games)
